catloaf.config.loafChance.description: Defines the chance of the cat becoming a loaf instead of sitting.
catloaf.config.overrideChanceWithBread.d: If holding bread, the chance of the cat becoming a loaf is 100%
catloaf.config.hideTailWhenLoafing.descr: The cat's tail is hidden when loafing, making it a more real loaf.
